name: Rainy Tiles
description:
In Rainy Tiles, you only have one simple goal: protect a house from flooding. Collect coins, place tiles, gather experience, upgrade your garden in this story-driven and fast-paced game about rain and tiles. In Rainy Tiles quick actions and adequate reactions are key: be quick or be dead!

Extract the zip folder and run the executable. For a smooth and responsive experience, playing the game in 1920x1080 is recommended.
